item.title: About Me
item.description: It has taken some time to get me interested in how computers work and untill I got my first experiences in this wonderful land. Let’s take a look. My story Ever since I remember, I always got interested in how things work. I always have been fullfilled with curiosity and wonders about how the world works. But it’s only at age six that I was immersed in the world of boop-beeps.
